original_title: Royal Commonwealth Society Sri Lanka Master Quiz competition on 9 Dec
original_body_lines: In a celebration of intellect and camaraderie, the Royal Commonwealth Society Sri Lanka has announced the conduct of a Master Quiz competition on Saturday 9 December at the iconic Grand Oriental Hotel Colombo from 3.00 p.m. to 6.00 p.m.

For just Rs. 5000, the ticket not only secures entry but also a delightful spread of refreshments. This occasion is specifically designed for corporate leaders and international diplomats, offering a superb platform for valuable networking opportunities.
The Society promises an unforgettable evening filled with the thrill of friendly competition and the chance to network with like-minded individuals.
